description: This is a C source file implementing synchronous OVSDB communication functions, including connection handling, JSON-RPC request sending, and response parsing. It facilitates synchronous interactions with OVSDB using JSON-RPC over sockets.

methods.name: int ovsdb_sync_write_fn(const char * buf,size_t sz,void * self)
methods.description: Callback function for writing JSON data synchronously over a socket. Writes the buffer to the provided file descriptor.

methods.name: json_t * ovsdb_write_s(char * ovsdb_sock_path,json_t * jsdata)
methods.description: Performs a synchronous write to OVSDB over a socket, establishing a connection, sending a JSON request, and reading the JSON response.

methods.name: json_t * ovsdb_method_send_s(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,ovsdb_mt_t mt,json_t * jparams)
methods.description: Builds and sends a JSON-RPC request to OVSDB synchronously, waits for the response, and returns the result JSON object.

methods.name: json_t * ovsdb_tran_call_s(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,ovsdb_tro_t oper,json_t * where,json_t * row)
methods.description: Convenience function to perform a synchronous transaction call to OVSDB.

methods.name: bool ovsdb_insert_with_parent_s(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,char * table,json_t * row,char * parent_table,json_t * parent_where,char * parent_column)
methods.description: Performs a synchronous insert operation with a parent relation in OVSDB.

methods.name: json_t * ovsdb_delete_with_parent_res_s(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,const char * parent_table,json_t * parent_where,const char * parent_column)
methods.description: Performs a delete operation with a parent relation in OVSDB and returns the response.

methods.name: bool ovsdb_delete_with_parent_s(const char * ovsdb_sock_path,char * table,json_t * where,char * parent_table,json_t * parent_where,char * parent_column)
methods.description: Performs a delete with parent transaction and releases response resources.

ctags.signature: (const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,json_t * where,const char * parent_table,json_t * parent_where,const char * parent_column)

ctags.name: ovsdb_delete_with_parent_s
ctags.signature: (const char * ovsdb_sock_path,char * table,json_t * where,char * parent_table,json_t * parent_where,char * parent_column)

ctags.name: ovsdb_insert_with_parent_s
ctags.signature: (const char * ovsdb_sock_path,char * table,json_t * row,char * parent_table,json_t * parent_where,char * parent_column)

ctags.name: ovsdb_tran_call_s
ctags.signature: (const char * ovsdb_sock_path,const char * table,ovsdb_tro_t oper,json_t * where,json_t * row)
